Class com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaEditor 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaObject
           |
           +----com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaEditor
public class KawaEditor
extends KawaObject
This object represents the editor under Kawa. A KawaEditor can be acquired by getEditor on KawaFile.

See Also:
KawaFile

KawaEditor(String)
Default constructor.

getEditorText()
Returns the text for the entire editor.
getLineCount()
Returns the total number of lines in this editor.
getLineIndex(long)
Returns the 0 based beginning character index of a line.
getLineLength(long)
Returns the length of a line.
getPath()
Returns the file path of the file assosiated with this editor.
getSelectEnd()
Returns the ending character of the selection.
getSelectStart()
Returns the starting character of the selection.
getSelectText()
Gets the currently selected text.
gotoLine(long, boolean)
Goto a line and set selection optionally.
isReadOnly()
Indicates if the editor is readonly.
open()
Opens the editor if not already open.
paste(String)
Pastes the given text into the editor.
save()
Saves the file.
setSelect(int, int)
Selects the text between the start and end.

KawaEditor 
 public KawaEditor(String path)
Default constructor.

Parameters:
path - Full absolute path of the file.

setSelect 
 public native boolean setSelect(int start,
                                 int end)
Selects the text between the start and end. Editor already needs to be open for this function to work.

Parameters:
start - Starting character. 0 based.
end - Ending character. 0 based. -1 will select till the end.
Returns:
true or false
getSelectText 
 public native String getSelectText()
Gets the currently selected text. Editor needs to be open for this function to work.

Returns:
selection text
getSelectStart 
 public native long getSelectStart()
Returns the starting character of the selection. 0 based. Editor needs to be open for this function to work.

Returns:
start position.
getSelectEnd 
 public native long getSelectEnd()
Returns the ending character of the selection. 0 based. Editor needs to be open for this function to work.

Returns:
ending position.
getPath 
 public String getPath()
Returns the file path of the file assosiated with this editor.

Returns:
path path of the file
paste 
 public native boolean paste(String text)
Pastes the given text into the editor. Replaces existing selection if any with new text. Editor needs to be open for this function to work.

Parameters:
text - Text to paste
Returns:
true or false.
open 
 public native boolean open()
Opens the editor if not already open.

Returns:
true or false.
isReadOnly 
 public native boolean isReadOnly()
Indicates if the editor is readonly.

Returns:
true or false.
save 
 public native boolean save()
Saves the file.

Returns:
true or false.
getLineCount 
 public native long getLineCount()
Returns the total number of lines in this editor.

Returns:
line count
getLineIndex 
 public native long getLineIndex(long line)
Returns the 0 based beginning character index of a line.

Parameters:
line - 0 based line number
Returns:
index of the beginning character
getLineLength 
 public native long getLineLength(long line)
Returns the length of a line.

Parameters:
line - 0 based line number
Returns:
line length
getEditorText 
 public native String getEditorText()
Returns the text for the entire editor.

Returns:
String of line text
gotoLine 
 public native void gotoLine(long line,
                             boolean sel)
Goto a line and set selection optionally.

Parameters:
line - Line number. 0 based.
sel - true will set selection.
